item.title: Need help making NPC's Drop items
item.dc:creator: @Fiendy Fiendy
item.description:
@Fiendy wrote:

Ok, i set Tyras Guards in Autospawn, they appear. I set some drops in npcdrops.

Then i tryed setting the drops in Items 2 and Items 3. I always get errors.
Can somebody help?

heres the errors usually

Heres my Items2 thing, help please…Im trying to get Tyras Guards to drop stuff, I called them tguards this time, becuase it wasnt working as “Tyras Guard” eather :\

[code]}

public static int tguard[] = {989,1079,1079,1127,1163,1163};

public static int randomtguard()
{
	return tguard[(int)(Math.random()*tguard.length)];
}[/code]

I
